Description: Collaborative project providing free, editable maps worldwide, including detailed data for China.
Provides regional extracts of OSM data for China in various formats like PBF and Shapefiles.
A web-based tool for querying and extracting specific data from OSM using custom queries.
Offers detailed maps, real-time traffic, POIs, and public transport data for China via APIs. Documentation primarily in Chinese.
License: Requires API key; subject to terms and conditions

Description: Provides extensive mapping data, including roads, buildings, and transit routes in China through APIs. Documentation in Chinese.
License: Requires API key; subject to terms and conditions

Description: Offers authoritative geospatial data and mapping products within China, including administrative boundaries and topographic maps.
License: Usage may be restricted; check terms on the website

Description: Provides geological data such as elevation models, land use, and other geospatial information relevant to China.
License: Usage may be restricted; check terms on the website

Description: Aggregates various open datasets within China, including urban infrastructure and environmental data.
License: Varies by dataset; check individual licenses

Description: High-resolution building footprints generated using deep learning algorithms, useful for urban planning and mapping projects.
Access Link: US: https://github.com/Microsoft/USBuildingFootprints; Canada: https://github.com/microsoft/CanadianBuildingFootprints; Africa: https://github.com/microsoft/AfricaBuildingFootprints; South Korea & Australia: https://github.com/microsoft/BuildingFootprints
License: Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL)

Description: Provides access to road, traffic, and transportation data via APIs.
License: Requires API key; subject to terms and conditions

Description: Microsoft contributes AI-generated map features to improve OSM data quality.
Locations and footprints of buildings derived from satellite imagery using machine learning models, covering Africa and Asia-Pacific regions.
License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0)

Description: Access to comprehensive road, building, and transportation data through various APIs, including Maps, Routes, and Places APIs.
License: Requires API key; billed based on usage

Description: Various datasets published by Google AI and Research that may include geospatial data relevant to buildings and transportation.
License: Varies by dataset; check individual licenses
